mapper.insert: insert into tbl_gateservice ( pk_GateId, gtSe_GateName, gtSe_GateIp, gtSe_GatePort, gtSe_CreateTime, gtSe_UpdateTime )values ( #{pkGateid}, #{gtseGatename}, #{gtseGateip}, #{gtseGateport}, #{gtseCreatetime}, #{gtseUpdatetime} )
mapper.update: update tbl_gateservice set pk_GateId=#{pkGateid}, gtSe_GateName=#{gtseGatename}, gtSe_GateIp=#{gtseGateip}, gtSe_GatePort=#{gtseGateport}, gtSe_CreateTime=#{gtseCreatetime}, gtSe_UpdateTime=#{gtseUpdatetime} where pk_GateId=#{pkGateid}
mapper.select: select pk_GateId, gtSe_GateName, gtSe_GateIp, gtSe_GatePort, gtSe_CreateTime, gtSe_UpdateTime, gtSe_GateState from tbl_gateservice where pk_GateId=#{pkGateid}
select pk_GateId, gtSe_GateName, gtSe_GateIp, gtSe_GatePort, gtSe_CreateTime, gtSe_UpdateTime, gtSe_GateState, gtSe_FailTimes from tbl_gateservice where pk_GateId=#{pkGateid}
mapper.update: update tbl_gateservice set gtSe_FailTimes=gtSe_FailTimes+1 where pk_GateId=#{pkGateid}
